thread.title: Karthik Subbaraj seeks justice for Nandini to end a long list of victims of Caste Supremacists - Tamil Movie News - IndiaGlitz.com
thread.title_full: Karthik Subbaraj seeks justice for Nandini to end a long list of victims of Caste Supremacists - Tamil Movie News - IndiaGlitz.com

title: Karthik Subbaraj seeks justice for Nandini to end a long list of victims of Caste Supremacists - Tamil Movie News - IndiaGlitz.com
text:
Kamal calls for Justice for Nandhini Ulaganayagan Kamal Haasan was the first Kollywood celebrity to raise his voice for the Justice of Nandhini who has been raped and murdered by her stalker and his friends. ALSO READ :Kamal calls for Justice for Nandhini Now young filmmaker Karthik Subbaraj has also condemned the heinous crime which has taken the life of a 17 year old girl. The vital part of Karthik Subbaraj's message is that he is spot in observing the caste angle in this murder and has the guts to speak about it. The 'Iraivi' director has called for the justice for not just Nandhini but for the "long list of victims of Caste Supremacists. 

Another horrible incident in TN.Justice should be given this time to end the long list of victims of Caste supremacists #JusticeforNandhini â€” karthik subbaraj (@karthiksubbaraj) February 4, 2017
